channel.title: Coffee Industry News
channel.description: Coffee Industry News: Your source for the latest news in the coffee and beverage industry

item.title: The Coffee Break Revamps Its Online Presence
item.description: The Coffee Break has dramatically revamped its Web site! Check out their site at http://www.example.com/thecoffeebreak.

item.title: Home Espresso Machine Sales up 25% from Last Year
item.description: Industry analysts have observed that home espresso machine sales are up 25% from last year. This should be good news to stores that sell coffee beans!
